commands.description: description
Ask Beldum's 8-ball a yes/no question.
Get the profile picture of a tagged user in the highest possible resolution.
Toss a coin, heads or tails. (Fun fact: there is a 1/6000 chance of a coin landing on its edge.)
Get the custom emoji's image in the current server in the highest possible resolution.
Performs a Google search with the specified keywords.
List all of this bot's commands.
Basic information and statistics about this bot.
Check Beldum-Bot's ping to see how it's doing.

commands.example: /remindme set to go out tomorrow at 10am
commands.description: Set a new reminder. (you can only have up to 10 reminders and each reminder must be at least 5 minutes from the present)
Show all active reminders.
Remove an active reminder
Set your time zone in order for reminders to function.
Found a bug? Get instructions on how to report a bug.
Random number generator that rolls a random number between two values inclusively.
Play rock paper scissors with Beldum-Bot.
Get the current server icon image in the highest possible resolution.
Play tictactoe with another user or by yourself. (command user will always start first)
Performs an Urban Dictionary search (it will return the top definition).
Performs a Youtube search.
